name: Human Detection
tagline: Implementation of Human Detection Algorithm by Zhu, Avidan et al in CVPR '06
body:
## Human Detection
This project was done in July-November 2012. I implemented a human detection algorithm, proposed by Zhu, Avidan et.al. in CVPR 2006.

The final report is available [here](https://github.com/rohitgirdhar/HumanDetection/blob/master/HumanDetection_report_RohitGirdhar.pdf?raw=true)

## To run the code
### Training (in matlab)
```
cd HumanDetection/training
det = train_detector(.001,.7,0.9,'test_pos','test_neg')
```
Now, det is the trained detector
### Testing (in matlab)
```
res = detector('image filename' , det);
DrawRect('image filename', res)
```
tester functions were used for evaluating the classifier on the standard [INRIA pedestrian dataset](http://pascal.inrialpes.fr/data/human/).
